recipesJson.name: Choco - #34
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
This recipe is made to see if FA Chocolate is similar to the chocolates that are in e-liquids such as "Golden Ticket"

As a recipe, it's a simple milk chocolate. Top note is a bit of cocoa with a milk chocolatey finish thats light and focuses on the dairy. Still trying to work this one out and find a useful chocolate to use in desserts.
